price: (19) As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do.
arabic: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum jannātu al-mawā nuzulan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
